TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 工具栏。

span.span: Represents a Windows toolbar.

summary.span: 尽管 替换了早期版本的 控件并添加了功能；但是也可选择保留 以备向后兼容和将来使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件用于显示可以显示为一个标准按钮，切换式按钮或下拉列表样式按钮控件。 controls are used to display controls that can appear as a standard button, a toggle-style button, or a drop-down style button. 你可以通过创建分配为的按钮图像，将其分配给的工具栏上，并将分配到的映像索引值的属性属性每个。You can assign images to the buttons by creating an , assigning it to the property of the toolbar, and assigning the image index value to the property each . 然后，可以指派要通过设置显示下方或图像的右侧文本属性。You can then assign text to be displayed underneath or to the right of the image by setting the property of the . 设置到工具栏的属性赋予工具栏和其按钮平面的外观。Set the property of the toolbar to to give the toolbar and its buttons a flat appearance. 为鼠标指针移过的按钮，他们对三维的外观更改。As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, their appearance changes to three-dimensional. 可使用分隔符将工具栏按钮划分成多个逻辑组。Toolbar buttons can be divided into logical groups by using separators. 分隔符是与工具栏按钮属性设置为`ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`。A separator is a toolbar button with the property set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`. 按钮分隔符显示为线，而不是当该工具栏具有平面外观时，按钮之间的空格。Button separators appear as lines rather than spaces between the buttons when the toolbar has a flat appearance. 如果属性设置为，工具栏按钮将出现引发和三维。If the property is set to , the toolbar buttons appear raised and three-dimensional. 如果指定的值属性外，在工具栏中的所有按钮都都限制为指定的大小。If you specify a value for the property, all buttons in the tool bar are restricted to the specified size. 否则，这些按钮调整其大小，具体取决于其内容与属性返回的最大的按钮的初始大小。Otherwise, the buttons adjust their size depending on their content, and the property returns the initial size of the largest button. 若要创建的集合控件以显示有关，通过使用单独添加按钮或方法属性。To create a collection of controls to display on the , add the buttons individually by using the or methods of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和三个控件。The following code example creates a and three controls. 工具栏按钮分配给按钮集合，集合将分配到工具栏，而工具栏添加到窗体。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form. 上事件工具栏上，属性计算的值，并打开相应的对话框。On the event of the toolbar, the property of the is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog box opened. 此代码需要、 、 ，和一个已创建。This code requires that a , an , a , and a have been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新创建的工具栏控件为空;添加控件通过设置属性。A newly created toolbar control is empty; add controls by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和三个控件。The following code example creates a and three controls. 工具栏按钮分配给按钮集合，集合将分配到工具栏，而工具栏添加到窗体。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form. 上事件工具栏上，属性计算的值，并打开相应的对话框。On the event of the toolbar, the property of the is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog box opened. 此代码需要、 、 ，和一个已创建。This code requires that a , an , a , and a have been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ToolBarAppearance Appearance { System::Windows::Forms::ToolBarAppearance get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ToolBarAppearance value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置值，该值确定工具栏控件及其按钮的外观。

span.span: Gets or set the value that determines the appearance of a toolbar control and its buttons.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会影响分配给工具栏的按钮的外观。The property affects the appearance of the buttons assigned to the toolbar. 当外观设置为`ToolBarAppearance.Normal`，三维和凸起将显示工具栏的按钮。When the appearance is set to `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`, the toolbar's buttons appear three-dimensional and raised. 设置到工具栏的属性`ToolBarAppearance.Flat`赋予平面的外观的工具栏按钮。Set the property of the toolbar to `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` to give the toolbar's buttons a flat appearance. 当鼠标指针移到平面按钮时，它们显示引发和三维。As the mouse pointer moves over the flat buttons, they appear raised and three-dimensional. 上的分隔符与属性设置为显示为刻的线而不是引发按钮之间的空格。Separators on a with the property set to appear as etched lines rather than spaces between the raised buttons. 平面样式按钮使你的应用程序具有更类似于 Web 的外观。The flat style buttons give your application a more Web-like look. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委托也将添加到和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要名为`toolBar1`和名为`imageList1`已声明。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The assigned value is not one of the values.

Public Overrides Property AutoSize As Boolean

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏是否根据按钮的大小和停靠样式自动调整其大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar adjusts its size automatically, based on the size of the buttons and the dock style.

value.span: 如果工具栏根据按钮大小和停靠样式自动调整其大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the toolbar adjusts its size automatically, based on the size of the buttons and dock style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`true`、控件自行调整大小以适应工具栏按钮，基于该按钮的大小，数它包含的对象和工具栏。When is set to `true`, the control sizes itself to accommodate the toolbar buttons, based upon the button size, the number of objects it contains, and the of the toolbar. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委托也将添加到和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要名为`toolBar1`和名为`imageList1`已声明。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolBar1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#564](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#564)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#564](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#564)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在凹陷的三维外观上可以执行时属性设置为`BorderStyle.Fixed3D`。The can take on a sunken, three-dimensional appearance when the property is set to `BorderStyle.Fixed3D`. 若要显示在工具栏控件周围平面的细边框，设置属性`BorderStyle.FixedSingle`。To display a flat thin border around the toolbar control, set the property to `BorderStyle.FixedSingle`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委托也将添加到和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要名为`toolBar1`和名为`imageList1`已声明。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Buttons As ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection

summary.span: 获取分配给工具栏控件的 控件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of controls assigned to the toolbar control.

value.span: 一个包含 控件集合的 。

span.span: A that contains a collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是从零开始的索引的集合用来保存所有分配给工具栏的控件。The property is a zero-based indexed collection used to hold all the controls assigned to the toolbar. 因为该属性是只读的它不能被指派工具栏按钮的集合直接。Because the property is read-only, it can not be assigned a collection of toolbar buttons directly. 工具栏按钮可以添加或删除通过使用继承自方法类。Toolbar buttons can be added or removed by using the methods inherited from the class. 使用方法将添加各个按钮和方法来删除一个按钮。Use the method to add individual buttons and the method to delete a button. 调用方法从集合中移除所有的按钮。Call the method to remove all the buttons from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化和三个控件。The following code example creates and initializes a and three controls. 工具栏按钮分配给工具栏和工具栏添加到窗体。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the toolbar and the toolbar is added to the form. 此代码需要已创建。This code requires that a has already been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.Buttons Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置工具栏控件上按钮的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the buttons on the toolbar control.

value.span: 表示工具栏上 控件大小的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents the size of the controls on the toolbar.

value.span: 默认大小为宽 24 个像素、高 22 个像素，或足以容纳 和文本，取其中的较大者。

span.span: The default size has a width of 24 pixels and a height of 22 pixels, or large enough to accommodate the and text, whichever is greater.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未设置，它设置为其默认值。If the is not set, it is set to its default. 或者，计算以适应最大和文本分配给控件。Alternatively, a is computed to accommodate the largest and text assigned to the controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委托也将添加到和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要名为`toolBar1`和名为`imageList1`已声明。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏是否显示分隔符。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分隔线将显示以帮助将工具栏与相邻的控件，如菜单区分开来。Dividers are displayed to help distinguish the toolbar from adjacent controls, such as menus. 分隔符显示为凸起边缘沿顶部控件。A divider is displayed as a raised edge along the top of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委托也将添加到和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要名为`toolBar1`和名为`imageList1`已声明。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]

span.span: if drop-down toolbar buttons display down arrows; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`false`，没有向下箭头显示在下拉列表样式工具栏按钮。When is set to `false`, no down arrows display on drop-down style toolbar buttons. 当用户单击工具栏上的下拉列表按钮时，则在菜单下拉选择中。When the user clicks the drop-down button on the toolbar, the menu drops down for selection. 当显示下拉箭头时，用户必须按向下箭头以显示菜单。When the drop-down arrow is displayed, the user must press the down arrow to display the menu. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委托也将添加到和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要名为`toolBar1`和名为`imageList1`已声明。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnButtonClick(class System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnButtonClick (e As ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置由工具提示显示的文本，设置每个属性上。To set the text displayed by the ToolTip, set the property of each on the . 若要使用户将鼠标指针移动到工具栏按钮时显示工具提示，设置属性`true`。To cause the ToolTip to display as the user moves the mouse pointer over the toolbar button, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委托也将添加到和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要名为`toolBar1`和名为`imageList1`已声明。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Wrappable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果工具栏太小以致无法在同一行显示所有按钮，工具栏按钮是否换到下一行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar buttons wrap to the next line if the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line.

value.span: 如果在工具栏太小以致无法在同一行内显示所有按钮时工具栏按钮换行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the toolbar buttons wrap to another line if the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可使用分隔符将工具栏按钮划分成多个逻辑组。Toolbar buttons can be divided into logical groups by using separators. 分隔符是与工具栏按钮属性设置为`ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`。A separator is a toolbar button with the property set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`. 如果属性设置为`true`和工具栏变得太小，无法在同一行显示所有按钮，工具栏分为更多行，具有发生分隔符分隔线。If the property is set to `true` and the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line, the toolbar is broken into additional lines, with the breaks occurring at the separators. 这可确保按钮组保持在一起。This ensures that button groups stay together. 工具栏换行时，可以分隔不是组中的工具栏按钮。Toolbar buttons that are not in a group can be separated when the toolbar wraps. 工具栏可能会变得太小，无法在同一行上显示所有按钮，如果其父一起调整大小。The toolbar can become too small to display all its buttons on the same line if its parent is resized. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a . 委托也将添加到和事件。Delegates are also added to the and events. 此示例需要名为`toolBar1`和名为`imageList1`已声明。This example requires that a named `toolBar1` and an named `imageList1` have been declared. [!code-cpp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CPP/mytoolbar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/CS/mytoolbar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolBar/VB/mytoolbar.vb#1)]
